briefTitle: Efficacy of Shinabro in Hand Osteoarthritis
officialTitle: Treatment Efficacy of 'Shinbaro Capsule' in the Treatment of Hand Osteoarthritis: Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Investigator Initiated Trial.
summary: GCSB-5 ("Shinbaro capsule"), is a mixture of 6 oriental herbs that have anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects along with an excellent safety profile. This study is aimed at investigating efficacy of Shinbaro in the treatment of hand osteoarthritis which needs a long term treatment in a placebo controlled, double-blind randomized trial.

primaryOutcome.measure: AUSCAN Pain Change at 4 Weeks From Baseline
